channel.title: Massing... with weapon
channel.description:
Hey, my server is a very good one... but. it has massing where you can click over and over on person and it kills them very fast... i need some help with getting that to stop.... thanks
Vid: http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=nULT9zp93gpBmZwfXlAVAw%3D%3D

item.title: Massing... with weapon
item.dc:creator: @ion5005 ion5005
item.description:
@ion5005 wrote:

Go to the weapon in Client.Java add an action timer.

Read full topic
